name: Dino Truck - Zoo Transporter
description:
In Dino Truck Transporting game you will have to be a professional driver who drive's the heavy cargo truck on a hilly off-road environment.

There are different levels with different tasks in which you have to transport the deadly dinosaurs, first of all you have to drive the truck to the destination and then you have to control the dino with controls and load it to the tuck and then drive back the truck to zoo. In some levels you also have to transport the dinosaurs with the help of helicopter because it difficult to drive in such environment.

All you have to do in this game is to save the wild life.

So what are you waiting for download it as free.
